description: Apple released emergency security updates to fix two zero-day vulnerabilities that were exploited in attacks on Intel-based Mac systems. [...]
title: Apple fixes two zero-days used in attacks on Intel-based Macs

description: The U.S. Cybersecurity & Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) has added three new flaws in its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) catalog, including a critical OS command injection impacting Progress Kemp LoadMaster. [...]
title: CISA tags Progress Kemp LoadMaster flaw as exploited in attacks

description: Ford is investigating allegations that it suffered a data breach after a threat actor claimed to leak 44,000 customer records on a hacking forum. [...]
title: Ford investgates alleged breach following customer data leak

description: Oracle has fixed an unauthenticated file disclosure flaw in Oracle Agile Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) tracked as CVE-2024-21287, which was actively exploited as a zero-day to download files. [...]
title: Oracle warns of Agile PLM file disclosure flaw exploited in attacks

description: D-Link is warning customers to replace end-of-life VPN router models after a critical unauthenticated, remote code execution vulnerability was discovered that will not be fixed on these devices. [...]
title: D-Link urges users to retire VPN routers impacted by unfixed RCE flaw

description: ​Microsoft announced today that hotpatching is now also available in preview on Windows 365 and Windows 11 Enterprise 24H2 client devices. [...]
title: Microsoft now testing hotpatch on Windows 11 24H2 and Windows 365

description: The new 'Helldown' ransomware operation is believed to target vulnerabilities in Zyxel firewalls to breach corporate networks, allowing them to steal data and encrypt devices. [...]
title: Helldown ransomware exploits Zyxel VPN flaw to breach networks

description: The Ngioweb botnet, which supplies most of the 35,000 bots in the cybercriminal NSOCKS proxy service, is being disrupted as security companies block traffic to and from the two networks. [...]
title: Botnet fueling residential proxies disrupted in cybercrime crackdown

description: Microsoft is working on a new Windows "Quick Machine Recovery" feature that will allow IT administrators to use Windows Update "targeted fixes" to remotely fix systems rendered unbootable. [...]
title: New Windows 11 recovery tool to let admins remotely fix unbootable devices

description: ​Microsoft announced today at its Ignite annual conference in Chicago, Illinois, that it's expanding its bug bounty programs with Zero Day Quest, a new hacking event focusing on cloud and AI products and platforms. [...]
title: Microsoft launches Zero Day Quest hacking event with $4 million in rewards

description: ​Microsoft has shared more details about the new Windows 11 administrator protection security feature, which is available in preview and uses Windows Hello authentication prompts to block access to critical system resources. [...]
title: Microsoft shares more details on Windows 11 admin protection

description: Spotify playlists and podcasts are being abused to push pirated software, game cheat codes, spam links, and "warez" sites. By injecting targeted keywords and links in playlist names and podcast descriptions, threat actors may benefit from boosting SEO for their dubious online properties appearing in Google. [...]
title: Spotify abused to promote pirated software and game cheats
